title: Implement Comprehensive Result Scoring
description:
Create unified scoring system that combines all validation signals.
        
Purpose:
- Integrate name, company, and search strategy confidence
- Provide transparent scoring for each result
- Allow threshold-based filtering

Implementation:
1. Score components:
   - Name match score (0-40 points)
   - Company match score (0-30 points)
   - Title/role match score (0-20 points)
   - Search strategy confidence (0-10 points)
2. Minimum threshold: 70/100 for acceptance
3. Return top result only if above threshold
4. Provide detailed score breakdown in logs
acceptance_criteria: Unified scoring system across all validators
